title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard to create a nested class, the context is not set correctly.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the new class wizard. 2. Select the option to create a nested class. 3. Follow the steps to create the nested class. 4. Verify that the context of the nested class is not set correctly.
